body:
Hi! Thank you for contributing, I've opened a pr to fix that issue.
#189

issue.title: [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities

repository.name: fastify
repository.description: Fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

#### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![medium severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/m.png "medium severity") | Prototype Pollution
[SNYK-JS-DOTPROP-543489](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-DOTPROP-543489) | Yes | Proof of Concept
Commit messages
Package name: fastify-cli The new version differs by 242 commits.
  • dd2a28e Bumped v1.4.0
  • c9d3e6b Remove update-notifier (#220)
  • e34cb04 Add -watch option to dev task (#215)
  • e3ae290 chore(package): update sinon to version 7.5.0 (#211)
  • e51cde6 fix(package): update yargs-parser to version 16.0.0 (#209)
  • 4d402cc Bumped v1.3.0
  • 4c94c20 feat: add support for customizing logger configuration (#207)
  • 3befd11 test: add test cases for inspect (#203)
  • 22e4c1e Debug mode for Fastify CLI Start (#202)
  • 64c11be Removal of check that plugin functions need to have 3 arguments (#201)
  • 7fc6f58 Bumped v1.2.0.
  • 034a8fb Add command to print routes (#193)
  • 8f2d3cc Update standard (#197)
  • a0d3dae chore(package): update rimraf to version 3.0.0 (#195)
  • be22ce2 chore: Make stop more readable (#190)
  • 1a11528 chore: simplify generate code (#189)
  • 1526078 Remove lock files from app template .gitignore (#188)
  • 9adea84 Update standard to the latest version üöÄ (#187)
  • 09d586f Fix standard
  • 88b2c25 chore(package): update standard to version 13.0.1
  • 015f609 Bumped v1.1.0
  • 53c4df7 chore: warns the user appropriately for non-existent files (#182)
  • 57166c5 chore(package): update fastify-autoload to version 1.0.0 (#185)
  • f8ca00c chore(package): update sinon to version 7.3.2 (#167)
See the full diff

issue.title: [Snyk] Security upgrade fastify-cli from 0.6.1 to 1.4.0

repository.name: fastify
repository.description: Fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=fastify-cli&from_version=0.6.1&to_version=1.4.0&pr_id=0eac8b00-8639-4b17-876d-b2bda085c283&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) #### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | **768/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Recently disclosed, Has a fix available, CVSS 7.5 | Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)
[SNYK-JS-ANSIREGEX-1583908](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-ANSIREGEX-1583908) | Yes | Proof of Concept (*) Note that the real score may have changed since the PR was raised.

  • 22e4c1e Debug mode for Fastify CLI Start (#202)
  • 64c11be Removal of check that plugin functions need to have 3 arguments (#201)
  • 7fc6f58 Bumped v1.2.0.
  • 034a8fb Add command to print routes (#193)
  • 8f2d3cc Update standard (#197)

  • be22ce2 chore: Make stop more readable (#190)
  • 1a11528 chore: simplify generate code (#189)
  • 1526078 Remove lock files from app template .gitignore (#188)
  • 9adea84 Update standard to the latest version üöÄ (#187)
  • 09d586f Fix standard

issue.title: [Snyk] Security upgrade fastify-cli from 0.11.0 to 1.4.0

repository.name: fastify

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=fastify-cli&from_version=0.11.0&to_version=1.4.0&pr_id=13eb501f-728e-49b6-abf1-6763ce80b833&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) #### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | **768/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Recently disclosed, Has a fix available, CVSS 7.5 | Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)
[SNYK-JS-ANSIREGEX-1583908](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-ANSIREGEX-1583908) | Yes | Proof of Concept (*) Note that the real score may have changed since the PR was raised.

issue.title: [Snyk] Security upgrade fastify-cli from 0.6.1 to 1.4.0

issue.body:
This PR was automatically created by Snyk using the credentials of a real user.


Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=fastify-cli&from_version=0.6.1&to_version=1.4.0&pr_id=f58805c2-5303-4f9f-a9bb-61716a810b37&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) #### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![medium severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/m.png "medium severity") | **556/1000**
**Why?** Recently disclosed, Has a fix available, CVSS 5.4 | Open Redirect
[SNYK-JS-GOT-2932019](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-GOT-2932019) | Yes | No Known Exploit (*) Note that the real score may have changed since the PR was raised.
